description: Defines a React component 'TodoItem' for a to-do list application, including state management, event handling, and rendering logic.

classes.name: TodoItem
classes.description: React component representing a single to-do item with editing, toggling, and deletion functionalities.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles saving or deleting the to-do item based on input value.

methods.name: handleEdit
methods.description: Initiates editing mode for the to-do item.

methods.name: handleKeyDown
methods.description: Handles key events for canceling or submitting edits.

methods.name: handleChange
methods.description: Updates component state with current input value.

methods.name: shouldComponentUpdate
methods.description: Optimizes rendering by comparing current and next props/state.

methods.name: componentDidUpdate
methods.description: Focuses input field when editing starts.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Returns JSX for rendering the to-do item.
